data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Pouthisat.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pouthisat, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Pouthisat.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Pouthisat, Cambodia to the gospel today.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Pouthisat. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Khmer people.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Pouthisat, Cambodia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Pouthisat, Cambodia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary:
the state of Pouthisat, Cambodia has a population of 495,800.

We estimate Pouthisat has 10,140 people who might know Jesus, 6,885 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 478,775 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 48 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 10,140 believers in Pouthisat to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

location.name: Pouthisat
location.cities_list: Pursat, Bakan, Veal Veaeng, Phnum Kravanh
location.cities_list_w_pop: Pursat (52,476), Bakan, Veal Veaeng, Phnum Kravanh
